room.not_open: This room is not open for new players.

lobby.title: Game Setup
lobby.wait_message: Waiting for the manager to start the game.
lobby.not_enough_players: There must be at least 2 players to start the game.

choose_characters.initial: The player owning the crown will start choosing characters.
choose_characters.put_aside_face_up: {0} must choose a character to put aside face up.
choose_characters.put_aside_face_down: {0} must choose a character to put aside face down.

actions.initial: The call is going to start.
actions.take_resources: Choose to take gold or draw cards.
actions.choose_action: Choose an action to carry out.
actions.magician_exchange_hand: Choose a player with whom you will exchange hands.
actions.magician_discard_cards: Choose cards you wish to discard.

characters.name: Assassin
characters.description: Call a character you wish to kill. The killed character skips their turn.

characters.name: Thief
characters.description: Call a character you wish to rob. When the robbed character is revealed, you take all his gold.

characters.name: Magician
characters.description: Either exchange hands of cards with another player or discard any number of cards to gain an equal number of cards.

characters.name: King
characters.description: Take the crown. Gain 1 gold for each of your Noble districts.

characters.name: Bishop
characters.description: The Warlord cannot use its ability on your districts. Gain 1 gold for each of your Religious districts.

characters.name: Merchant
characters.description: Gain 1 extra gold. Gain 1 gold for each of your Trade districts.

characters.name: Architect
characters.description: Gain 2 extra cards. You can build up to 3 districts.

characters.name: Warlord
characters.description: Destroy 1 district by paying 1 fewer gold than its cost. Gain 1 gold for each of your Military districts.

dragon_gate.name: Dragon Gate
dragon_gate.description: At the end of the game, score 2 extra points.

university.name: University
university.description: At the end of the game, score 2 extra points.

map_room.name: Map Room
map_room.description: At the end of the game, score 1 extra point for each card in your hand.

imperial_treasury.name: Imperial Treasury
imperial_treasury.description: At the end of the game, score 1 extra point for each gold in your stash.

haunted_quarter.name: Haunted Quarter
haunted_quarter.description: At the end of the game, the Haunted Quarter counts as any 1 district type of your choice.

school_of_magic.name: School of Magic
school_of_magic.description: For abilities that gain resources for your districts, the School of Magic counts as the district type of your choice.

keep.name: Keep
keep.description: The Warlord cannot use its ability on the Keep.

great_wall.name: Great Wall
great_wall.description: The Warlord must pay 1 extra gold to destroy your other districts.

graveyard.name: Graveyard
graveyard.description: When the Warlord destroys a district, you may pay 1 gold to recover it in your hand. You cannot use this ability if you are Warlord yourself.

observatory.name: Observatory
observatory.description: If you choose to draw cards when gathering resources, draw 3 cards instead of 2.

library.name: Library
library.description: If you choose to draw cards when gathering resources, keep all drawn cards.

laboratory.name: Laboratory
laboratory.description: Once per turn, discard 1 card from your hand to gain 2 gold.

smithy.name: Smithy
smithy.description: Once per turn, pay 2 gold to gain 3 cards.
